pages.title: Placeable Items
pages.text: The following items can now be placed in block form:$(li)$(item)Sticks$()$(li)$(item)Blaze Rods$()$(li)$(item)Gunpowder$()$(li)$(item)Books$()$(li)$(item)Enchanted Books$()$(br2)As expected, $(item)Gunpowder$() can also be set on fire, and will naturally ignite adjacent $(item)TNT$().
